DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability MEDI-545 Japanese adult SLE patient . This do collecting data 3 cohort IV dose 1 cohort SC dose .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Tolerability IV SC Dose MEDI-545 Patients With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus .
DOC.criteria: Patients must previously meet ≥4 11 revise ACR criterion Have positive antinuclear antibody test ( ANA ) ≥1:80 serum dilute past screen Have least 1 system score A 2 system score B BILAG index screening , SELENASLEDAI score ≥6 Have receive prednisone > 20 mg/day ( equivalent dose another oral corticosteroid ) within 14 day Visit 2 ( Day 1 ) Have receive following medication within 28 day Visit 2 ( Day 1 ) : Systemic cyclophosphamide dose Cyclosporine dose Tacrolimus dose Thalidomide dose Mycophenolate mofetil > 2 g/day Methotrexate > 15 mg/week Azathioprine > 2 mg/kg/day Women positive pregnancy test ( serum hCG ) Visit 1
